verses.verse: Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4100>"What<s%> do you mean by <S%H9301>using<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4912>proverb<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'The fathers <S%H1>eat<s%> the <S%H398>sour<s%> <S%H1155>grapes,<s%> But the children's <S%H1155>teeth<s%> are <S%H8127>set<s%> on <S%H6949>edge<s%>'?

"As I <S%H2416>live,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "you are <S%H518>surely<s%> not going to <S%H9301>use<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4912>proverb<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5750>anymore.<s%>

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%> are Mine; the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the father as well as the <S%H1>soul<s%> of the <S%H5315>son<s%> is Mine. The <S%H1121>soul<s%> who <S%H5315>sins<s%> will <S%H2398>die.<s%>
"But <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H6213>practices<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%>

and does not <S%H398>eat<s%> at the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> [shrines] or <S%H5375>lift<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or <S%H2930>defile<s%> his neighbor's <S%H802>wife,<s%> or <S%H7126>approach<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> during her <S%H5079>menstrual<s%> <S%H5079>period<s%> –

if a <S%H376>man<s%> does not <S%H3238>oppress<s%> anyone, but <S%H7725>restores<s%> to the <S%H2326>debtor<s%> his <S%H9114>pledge,<s%> does not <S%H1497>commit<s%> <S%H1500>robbery,<s%> [but] <S%H5414>gives<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> and <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H5903>naked<s%> with <S%H899>clothing,<s%>

if he does not <S%H5414>lend<s%> [money] on <S%H5392>interest<s%> or <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8636>increase,<s%> [if] he <S%H7725>keeps<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> [and] <S%H6213>executes<s%> <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H376>man,<s%>

[if] he <S%H1980>walks<s%> in My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and My <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> so as to <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H571>faithfully<s%> – he is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> [and] will <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H5002>"declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"Then he may <S%H3205>have<s%> a <S%H6530>violent<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> who <S%H8210>sheds<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H259><s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> to a <S%H251>brother<s%>

(though he <S%H1931>himself<s%> did not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%>), that is, he <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> at the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> [shrines,] and <S%H2930>defiles<s%> his neighbor's <S%H802>wife,<s%>

<S%H3238>oppresses<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> <S%H1497>commits<s%> <S%H1500>robbery,<s%> does not <S%H7725>restore<s%> a <S%H2258>pledge,<s%> but <S%H5375>lifts<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H1544>idols,<s%> [and] <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H8441>abomination,<s%>

he <S%H5414>lends<s%> [money] on <S%H5392>interest<s%> and <S%H3947>takes<s%> <S%H8636>increase;<s%> will he <S%H2421>live<s%>? He will not <S%H2421>live!<s%> He has <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> he will <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death;<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will be on his own head.

"Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H3205>has<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> who has <S%H7200>observed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his father's <S%H9128>sins<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>committed,<s%> and <S%H7200>observing<s%> does not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2004>likewise.<s%>

"He does not <S%H398>eat<s%> at the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> [shrines] or <S%H5375>lift<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or <S%H2930>defile<s%> his neighbor's <S%H802>wife,<s%>

or <S%H3238>oppress<s%> <S%H376>anyone,<s%> or <S%H9111>retain<s%> a <S%H2258>pledge,<s%> or <S%H1497>commit<s%> <S%H1500>robbery,<s%> [but] he <S%H5414>gives<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> and <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H5903>naked<s%> with <S%H899>clothing,<s%>

he <S%H7725>keeps<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> does not <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5392>interest<s%> or <S%H8636>increase,<s%> [but] <S%H6213>executes<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H1980>walks<s%> in My <S%H2708>statutes;<s%> he will not <S%H4191>die<s%> for his father's <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> he will <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live.<s%>

"As for his father, <S%H1>because<s%> he <S%H3588>practiced<s%> <S%H6231>extortion,<s%> <S%H6233>robbed<s%> [his] <S%H1497>brother,<s%> and <S%H251>did<s%> <S%H6213>what<s%> was not <S%H834>good<s%> <S%H2896>among<s%> his <S%H8432>people,<s%> <S%H9415>behold,<s%> he will <S%H2009>die<s%> for his <S%H4191>iniquity.<s%>

"Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4069>'Why<s%> should the <S%H1121>son<s%> not <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> for the father's <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>?' When the <S%H1121>son<s%> has <S%H6213>practiced<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and has <S%H8104>observed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> them, he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live.<s%>

"The <S%H5315>person<s%> who <S%H2398>sins<s%> will <S%H4191>die.<s%> The <S%H1121>son<s%> will not <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> for the father's <S%H1>iniquity,<s%> <S%H5771>nor<s%> will the father <S%H3808>bear<s%> the <S%H5375>punishment<s%> for the son's <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> the <S%H5771>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H6666>righteous<s%> will be upon himself, and the <S%H6662>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H7564>wicked<s%> will be upon himself.

"But <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H9128>sins<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6213>committed<s%> and <S%H8104>observes<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and <S%H6213>practices<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live;<s%> he shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> his <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6213>committed<s%> will not be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> against him; because of his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6213>practiced,<s%> he will <S%H2421>live.<s%>

"Do I <S%H2654>have<s%> <S%H2654>any<s%> <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3808>"rather<s%> <S%H3808>than<s%> that he should <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H1870>ways<s%> and <S%H2421>live<s%>?

"But when a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H6213>does<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> <S%H6213>does,<s%> will he <S%H2421>live<s%>? <S%H3605>All<s%> his <S%H6666>righteous<s%> <S%H6666>deeds<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6213>done<s%> will not be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> for his <S%H4604>treachery<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H4603>committed<s%> and his <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed;<s%> for them he will <S%H4191>die.<s%>

"Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> 'The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>right.<s%>' <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel!<s%> Is My <S%H1870>way<s%> not <S%H8505>right<s%>? Is it not your <S%H1870>ways<s%> that are not <S%H8505>right<s%>?

"When a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H4191>dies<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of it, for his <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6213>committed<s%> he will <S%H4191>die.<s%>

"Again, when a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6213>committed<s%> and <S%H6213>practices<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> he will <S%H2421>save<s%> his <S%H5315>life.<s%>

"Because he <S%H7200>considered<s%> and <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6213>committed,<s%> he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live;<s%> he shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%>

"But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> 'The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>right.<s%>' Are My <S%H1870>ways<s%> not <S%H8505>right,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? Is it not your <S%H1870>ways<s%> that are not <S%H8505>right<s%>?

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> according to his <S%H1870>conduct,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%> <S%H7725>"Repent<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> so that <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> may not <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H4383>stumbling<s%> <S%H4383>block<s%> to you.

<S%H7993>"Cast<s%> <S%H7993>away<s%> from you <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6586>committed,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> yourselves a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> and a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit!<s%> For <S%H4100>why<s%> will you <S%H4191>die,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

"For I <S%H2654>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H4194>death<s%> of anyone who <S%H4191>dies,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%> "Therefore, <S%H7725>repent<s%> and <S%H2421>live.<s%>"
